Class Result.Broadcast

java.lang.Object
dev.royalcore.api.errors.Result.Broadcast
All Implemented Interfaces:
Result
Enclosing interface:
Result
public static final class Result.Broadcast extends Object implements Result
Aggregates multiple Result instances and prints them together.

This is useful when an operation consists of several sub-steps, each of which returns a Result, and you want to collect and output all of them at once.

  • Nested Class Summary
